text: Trader Horn is a 1931 American romantic adventure movie directed by W. S. Van Dyke and was based on the novel of the same name by Alfred Aloysius Horn. It stars Harry Carey, Edwina Booth, Duncan Renaldo, C. Aubrey Smith and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. Booth would sue Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer after she contracted an illness while shooting the movie and it ended her career as an actress. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1931 and was remade in 1973. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1931 movies Category:1930s romance movies Category:1930s adventure movies Category:American romance movies Category:American adventure movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by W. S. Van Dyke
title: Trader Horn
